name: Number Wizard
description:
You have entered the home of The Number Wizard. His magical powers are immense, if slightly limited. He has the power to read your mind - but only after you've given him a dozen or so clues.

To be honest he is actually a pretty useless mind reader - but he looks cool. Think of a number between 1 and 1,000 then watch as the number wizard slowly and painfully works out what that number is.

Controls

  • Push higher if your number is higher than his guess
  • Push lower if the number is lower
